==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しつ|がい|こつ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=しつがいこつ}} {{m|zh|膝蓋骨}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|しつがいこつ|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しつがいこつ}}

# {{lb|ja|anatomy|sort=しつがいこつ}} The [[patella]], the [[kneecap]].

====Usage notes====
Both {{m|ja|膝の皿|tr=hiza no sara}} and {{m|ja|膝皿|tr=hiza sara}} are also in use in modern Japanese, with {{m|ja|膝の皿|tr=hiza no sara}} used more frequently of the two. The term {{m|ja|膝蓋骨|tr=shitsugaikotsu}} is somewhat more technical, a bit like English {{m|en|patella}} compared to {{m|en|kneecap}}.

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|膝の皿|ひざ の さら}}
* {{ja-r|膝皿|ひざ さら}}
* {{ja-r|膝頭|ひざ がしら}}
